Text:
unfortunatelly this update is screwed up
my fps is steady at 60 and then a sec later drops to 47 then climb up,and every 2 seconds it drops again.reverting previous patch and its working good again

Found the problem!
DO NOT USE steam_api.dll FROM THIS RELEASE!
Only use their exe for game!
updates will still be in game
The STEAM DLL kills fps in game as i mentioned in previous post!

i dont know what u are doubting
and i dont care really steam dll from this is screwed up totaly

IcemanSR you mean it will kill fps on same graphic settings before installing update?
Did you check vsync after install?

Hay! Can't find a description about this Update
on the steam website or anywhere. I follow the
"http://store.steampowered.com/app/222480" 
link and found nothing. Can anybody confirm if
this update is for real and does it really work?

=====================================
Added:
 - 2048×1152 and 2560×1080 resolution support

Fixed:
 - ON/OFF toggle for the Mouse Acceleration setting was previously backwards. ON is now actually ON and OFF is OFF.
 =====================================

***IMPORTANT NOTE***
 Please recheck and test mouse acceleration settings after today’s patch. (Hint: set acceleration to ‘OFF’). 

Watch out tho, this release seems to be not good as many ppl have lag-stuttering issues. ye been warned.

working perfect, did not used included steam dll as some guy said

there is some update 4 around
